categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic short stories

nodes.text: The Sixth Line is a two-part short story published in the developer blog for Star Wars: The Old Republic in advance of Game Update 3.2, released on April 28, 2015. The story introduces the Sixth Line, a militant faction of the Jedi Order that appeared in the update for the story arc of Ziost; the first part was released on April 24, and the second on April 28.
